channel.title: Moonshoot thinking on Andres Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Moonshoot thinking on Andres Blog

item.title: Aim high
item.description: “Ideas are like fish. If you want to catch small fish, you can stay in the shallow water. But if you want to catch the big fish, you have to go deeper. In the deep, the fish are more powerful and pure. They are giant and abstract. And they are very beautiful. ~David Lynch The goals we set for ourselves are like fish. Do we choose a small fish or a big one?
